questions.question: How do I get started with InterviewerAI?
questions.answer: Getting started is easy! Simply sign up for a free account, choose your industry and role, and start your first AI-powered interview session. You can begin practicing immediately with our guided setup process.

questions.question: Is there a free trial available?
questions.answer: Yes! All our plans include a 7-day free trial with full access to all features. No credit card is required to start your trial. You can upgrade to a paid plan anytime during or after your trial.

questions.question: What industries and roles do you support?
questions.answer: We support 50+ industries including Technology, Finance, Healthcare, Marketing, Sales, Engineering, Design, and more. Each industry has role-specific questions tailored to different experience levels.

questions.question: Can I use InterviewerAI on mobile devices?
questions.answer: Yes! InterviewerAI is fully responsive and works on all devices including smartphones and tablets. You can practice interviews anywhere, anytime with our mobile-optimized interface.

questions.question: How realistic are the AI interview sessions?
questions.answer: Our AI is trained on thousands of real interview scenarios and uses advanced natural language processing to provide realistic, contextual responses. The AI adapts to your answers and asks follow-up questions just like a real interviewer.

questions.question: What types of questions does the AI ask?
questions.answer: The AI asks a mix of behavioral, technical, and situational questions relevant to your industry and role. Questions range from basic to advanced, and the AI can ask follow-up questions based on your responses.

questions.question: Can I customize the interview scenarios?
questions.answer: Yes! Professional and Enterprise users can create custom interview scenarios, set specific topics, and even simulate interviews with particular company styles or interview formats.

questions.question: How long do interview sessions typically last?
questions.answer: Interview sessions typically last 15-30 minutes, but you can adjust the duration based on your preferences. You can also pause and resume sessions at any time.
